== datetime & time ==

datetime与time之间的相互转换如下几步：

{{{
>>> import time, datetime
>>> t = time.time()
>>> d_from_t = datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(t)
>>> d_from_t
datetime.datetime(2008, 10, 31, 12, 50, 29, 578000)
>>> tt = time.mktime(d_from_t.timetuple())
>>> tt
1225428629.0
>>> t
1225428629.5780001
}}}

不过在转换的过程中需要注意的是：
* time到datetime的转换是忽略小数点后面的数值
* 即：int(t) = int(tt), t != tt
